Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A flurothyl ether seizure screening technique was used to evaluate seizure susceptibility in adult mice that received neonatal injections of MSG ( 4 mg / g and 1 mg / g ) .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| MSG (Monosodium Glutamate) |

Explanation:

* MSG (Monosodium Glutamate) is a disease entity mentioned in the paragraph as the substance that was injected into mice.

Note: I have not included "seizure" as a disease entity, as it is not explicitly mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| MSG |

Explanation:

* MSG (Monosodium Glutamate) is the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph.
